Articles.Content:
I know there are a bunch of bronies on the forum. I know there are a fair number of people who dislike pony images being dropped in threads that have, otherwise, nothing to do with the show, and are being done just for the purposes of posting pony images.

Well then, I say, post them here. Episode discussion, fan artwork, whatever people like, and hopefully we can avoid bothering others with it.

Good plan? Good plan.

So! Most recent episode, S2E17, 'Hearts & Hooves Day'. It\'s obviously a Valentine\'s Day episode, and involved the CMCs, who I usually find less interesting than the main cast, but-- contrary to a number of other people\'s opinions-- I quite liked this one. For starters, we see the CMCs do something completely unrelated to getting their cutie marks (in fact it wasn\'t even mentioned). Big Mac got some pretty cool strength feats to his name, which I don\'t want to spoil in case anybody hasn\'t seen the episode. Humour was good. All in all one of my favourite episodes of the season, up there with 'Read It & Weep', 'The Secret of My Excess', 'Last Roundup', and 'Sisterhooves Social'. Song wasn\'t as good as many of them, unfortunately.

And now, miscellaneous artwork!

TO ALL MODS.

This is free speech. People don\'t have to post here.

TO THE PEOPLE WANTING TO BAN THIS THREAD

This is free speech. They are not focusing it on you. Let them share there pictures, its not hurting you. And it better than having pony images on every other thread on the forums!!!!

In an unexpected turn of events, I fully support the creation and existence of this thread.

Better here, than all over the rest of the forum.

Edit: ...who deleted mincespy\'s post above mine?

Edit: ...who deleted mincespy\'s post above mine?

Me.

I decided it was unnecessary.

Me.

I decided it was unnecessary.

Ah, okay. Thought there was a grand conspiracy unfolding...

Oh well, maybe next time.
Actually, this idea had been done on another forum and it worked very well. I hardly ever saw a pony once they created their megathread, which is currently on page 141.
Yeah. I fully support this thread, because I am against the ponification of this forum.

Actually, this idea had been done on another forum and it worked very well. I hardly ever saw a pony once they created their megathread, which is currently on page 141.

Agreed with luigi.

Mods, please don\'t ban this thread. It will help reduce the pony spam by a lot.

Mods, please don\'t ban this thread. It will help reduce the pony spam by a lot.

NovaSilisco\'s right, there\'s grand conspiracy unfolding. To get all the pony haters in one thread -- and ban \'em all at once ;D

NovaSilisco\'s right, there\'s grand conspiracy unfolding. To get all the pony haters in one thread -- and ban \'em all at once ;D

That means you\'ll get banned aswell! Why did you post?!

Oh... Damn...

That means you\'ll get banned aswell! Why did you post?!

Oh... Damn...

No. We won\'t get banned. What will happen is that this thread will end the pony spam across all areas of the forum.

This has several advantages:

-People who want to join but don\'t because of all the pony spam will now join

-People who dislike ponies won\'t be annoyed by them anymore

-The mods don\'t have to combat constant pony spam and can get on with being mods.

So, this thread is good for everyone.

Yes I know.

Did you read Tosh\'s post?

I meant it as a joke.

Yes I know.

Did you read Tosh\'s post?

I meant it as a joke.

I know. But I was listing the advantages so the mods wouldn\'t ban this thread, because this thread is good for everyone.

Mods, If you\'re reading this, please listen. This thread will reduce pony spam across all areas of the forum. Please do not ban this thread. You will see that the pony spam will decrease if you do not ban this thread. Please, mods.

Oh ok.

*Mentally splits mincespy\'s post into seperate sections*

TO ALL MODS.

This is free speech. People don\'t have to post here.

TO THE PEOPLE WANTING TO BAN THIS THREAD

This is free speech. They are not focusing it on you. Let them share there pictures, its not hurting you. And it better than having pony images on every other thread on the forums!!!!

For the record, Free Speech only applies to the government restricting speech. This is a privately owned forum and they are free to say what is and is not allowed.

For now this thread will stay, but the second it turns ugly, and I\'m sure it will eventually, it will be locked.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
For now this thread will stay, but the second it turns ugly, and I\'m sure it will eventually, it will be locked.

You don\'t like ponies do you.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Quick, this thread need muffins!

You don\'t like ponies do you.

No, he doesn\'t, but ease up on the 18pt font there, mince. Don\'t prove him right, especially if you think Skunky (or others) are just looking for an excuse.

From where I sit, the only reason this thread will turn ugly is if we react badly to the people who show up to troll and the mods overreact to that. As long as e\'rybody stays cool, things\'ll be fine. I\'ve seen this work on other forums, in megathreads whose total post count approaches 10% of the entire KSP forum, and it\'ll work here.

If someone asks 'Why do you like this', give a reasonable answer; if someone goes 'arghble blarghle ponies should be banned from everything'... well, ignore them. They\'re not even worth an image macro.

EDIT:

[Cpt. Skunky posts image macro]

Could you try not to do the thing I\'ve seen you grousing about, Skunky? I\'m trying to make your job easier here.

EDIT2:

Ah foamy, at least my image is KSP oriented. ;P

And I am not opposed to ponies or this thread. I am apposed to people that would troll the members of this forum be they bronies or not. Were someone to come into this thread and start harassing you guys, I would slap them down just as hard.

While it\'s true I don\'t care for MLP, I\'m not going to judge someone else because they do. What I will judge is your behavior, brony or not.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Well, this thread might as well be an experiment. Let\'s see if it reduces pony spam across all other threads, and if it does hooray.

From where I sit, the only reason this thread will turn ugly is if we react badly to the people who show up to troll and the mods overreact to that.

Pony megathreads I\'ve seen turn ugly on other forums typically did so because people started posting pony porn. And if that happens here, I\'m going to banhammer you lot myself.

Pony megathreads I\'ve seen turn ugly on other forums typically did so because people started posting pony porn. And if that happens here, I\'m going to banhammer you lot myself.

THANK YOU

people start posting pony porn.

Why would someone do that?

Pony megathreads I\'ve seen turn ugly on other forums typically did so because people started posting pony porn. And if that happens here, I\'m going to banhammer you lot myself.

If people start posting pony porn, ban whoever did it with my blessings. Those people are creepy. Or trolls, but either way.
